abilities.name: Earthquake
about: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration.

abilities.name: Quake Slam
about: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration

abilities.name: Living Bomb
about: Charges up and detonates after short delay

abilities.name: Lightning Pillars
about: Creates a lightning wall between activated pillars that deal lightning damage over time, slow enemies and apply shock
